secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_i973:angular momentum].
2. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_i974:change in angular momentum]. Define [OBJ:expsec_i974:conservation of angular momentum].
3. [OBJ:expsec_i961:Compare and contrast] rotational motion equations and linear motion equations.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37200:Calculate] angular momentum.
2. [OBJ:qc_37204:Calculate] the change in angular momentum.
